title: Lost iPhone 13
description: A black iPhone 13 with a cracked screen was lost near Central Park, Dhaka. The phone has a gold case and a broken front camera.
name: John Doe

title: Found Wallet
description: A black leather wallet containing ID cards and cash was found near the shopping mall in Gulshan. No contact information was in the wallet.
name: Alice Smith

title: Lost Pet Dog
description: A small brown terrier dog was lost near Dhanmondi. The dog is friendly and was wearing a red collar.
name: Michael Johnson

title: Found Camera
description: A Nikon DSLR camera was found in the parking lot of a restaurant in Banani. The camera is in working condition.
name: Sarah Lee

title: Lost Gold Ring
description: A gold ring was lost during a wedding at a venue in Mirpur. The ring has a small engraving on the inside.
name: Rina Das

title: Found Glasses
description: A pair of prescription glasses were found on the street near the High Court. The glasses are in a black case.
name: Fahim Khan

title: Lost Watch
description: A silver wristwatch with a black leather strap was lost at the airport. The watch has a small scratch on the face.
name: Nazmul Hossain

title: Found Necklace
description: A gold necklace was found near a café in Uttara. It looks quite valuable and was found in a small velvet pouch.
name: Sana Ahmed

title: Lost Bicycle
description: A blue mountain bike was lost near the university campus. It has a white seat and black tires.
name: Shahidul Islam

title: Found Earring
description: A small diamond earring was found near the fountain in the park. It seems like part of a pair.
name: Nadia Begum

title: Lost Laptop
description: A Dell laptop was left behind at a café. It has a blue cover and is in a black case.
name: Laila Rahman

title: Found ID Card
description: An ID card with the name 'Rafael Ahmed' was found in the subway station. It looks like a work ID.
name: Rashid Rahman
